settings.launch_popup_text:
The augmented reality feature is intended to be used as a guide, so you can see how a Gessen Syrup Bowl would look in your home.

The size and colour of the bowl are not 100% accurate, and is intended to be a guide only. For dimensions please refer to the dimensions information.

Enjoy!
